exceptions.tactic: intros xs ps x H1 H2 H3.
intros xs' ps x H1 H2 H3.
intros xs' ps' x H1 H2 H3.
intros xs' ps' x' H1 H2 H3.

original: intros xs ps x H1 H2 H3. unfold perm_eq, all in H1, H2. rewrite -> filter_mask in H1. apply in_mapP in H1. destruct H1 as [[a b] [H4 H5 H6]]. unfold id in H5. apply in_map_iff in H4. destruct H4 as [c [H7 H8]]. rewrite <- H8 in H6. rewrite <- H7. apply in_map_iff. exists (c, true). auto.
